entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023
